review: This small piece of technology enabled me to share whatever photo, video or webpage in my iphone 4s, ipad 2, or MacBook Air with my family. It's amazing how it works on its own with all the devices connected to my home network without any installation whatsoever. I have 4 Apple TV 3rd Generation installed at home in 4 different rooms, and whenever I click on AirPlay icon I instantly get the list of four rooms to choose from. It's just like magic!
author: Haider Sahib

review: The only real question is if it actually does all the things it claims to do. It does!  Easy to set up. Nice on screen interface. Mirrored my iPhone and my iPad beautifully to my TV. Found my PC computer on my network and I played my iTunes library through my TVs attached sound system. Great little toy. Pod casts and movies are my next venture.
